description: This source file defines a UI component called 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies a template for rendering, manages internal state for favoriting, and handles user input to toggle the state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button that toggles its state between favorited and unfavorited when entered.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's internal state, including whether it is favorited and the texts displayed for each state.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Event handler for the 'enter' input, toggles the 'isFavorited' state.
